name: Fayju Ball
description:
Go tilt crazy! FAYJU BALL did when it went to Number 1 in Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Russia, Greece, Poland, Hungary, Israel, Taiwan and Macau :0)

Touch arcade - "An incredibly cool puzzle game where you must roll balls of different colors in to matching holes. What blew my mind the first time I played the game was that some of these puzzles require you to hold the phone upside down to mall the ball roll towards the screen. Definitely give this one a try."

FAYJU BALL uses real world gravity in a multi-level 3D physics puzzle game. roll the balls into the correct holes. If the wrong one goes in, don't worry just turn your phone upside down and they will fall out.

- 60 awesome levels
- Auto saves your best time on each level
- Medal achievement system
- Intuitive controls using the built-in accelerometer
- Gameplay in 3D physics
- Stunning 3D graphics

restart any level immediately to improve your time
